newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks slightly lower in OTC trade.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks slightly lower in OTC trade.

text.p: Following is the closing report for Croatia's over-the-counter market in Varazdin, including its output for Osijek, for Monday, October 21.
* Of twelve active stocks, two rose, seven fell and three were flat.
* Volume higher at 4,588 units, turnover also up at 297,153 German marks.
* Top loser was hotelier Suncani Hvar, falling 11.11 percent to 24 marks, with 714 shares traded.
* Croatia Banka was the biggest of the only two gainers, up 5.26 percent to 40 marks, selling 558 shares.
* The most actively traded was hotelier Arenaturist on volume of 847 shares, down 5.80 percent to 65 marks.
